position.title: Senior Go Developer - Backend Node Team
position.description: We're looking for a Senior Backend Golang Engineer to develop our core technology. You'll work with the engineering team to research, spec, and implement blockchain scalability solutions that enable mass adoption. In addition, as a Backend Golang Engineer, you will collaborate with team members in making architectural decisions, choosing best practices, and bringing in new ideas.
responsibilities: Design and implement quality backend architectures that connect with blockchain platforms like Hermez and Ethereum.
Develop high-quality, performant, modern, clean and readable code within tight deadlines.
Take ownership of the development and maintenance of the project from ideation to deployment.
Work with the engineering, design, and product teams collaboratively, contributing ideas that add value to our product roadmap and company goals.
skills: Minimum 7-8 years experience in designing and implementing quality backend architectures.
Min 2-3 years experience working with Golang.
Previous experience working with SQL, noSQL Database and service APIs. Messaging services, cryptography, and GRPC are a plus.
Knowledge in Ethereum blockchain. Smart Contract Development in Solidity is an advantage.
Experience in taking ownership of the development and maintenance of the backend stack.
Experience working with product teams to transform ideas and designs into great solutions.
Develop high-quality, performant, modern, clean and readable code.
Previous experience working with Kanban task management framework is nice to have.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English.
niceToHave: Experienced working in projects using cryptography, complex maths and complex database structures.
Familiar with existing L2 blockchain solutions.
